name: reserved order for MARY LOU
description: this invoice is for 2  decks of Under Appreciated Animals matching memory cards, at $15 each

name: ABC Alphabet Poster featuring the Under Appreciated Animals series
description:
A is for Alligator
B is for Bear
C is for Cat

... there's nothing *wrong* with that, of course, but your kid's cooler than that, right? 
Why not spruce up her room and give her something to get REALLY excited about with the Under-appreciated Animal series by *mightyPigeon!?

this project began when I started realizing that my son's favorite animals at the zoo were also the ones you never see in books or cards or toys for kids... he loved the Dik-Dik, for example, but I couldn't find him any books or cards that didn't use a Dog, a Duck or a Deer. 

raise a cooler kid & learn about some new animals at the same time!

this listing is for a 12x16" poster featuring all 26 animals & letters. 


i'll be adding the rest of the alphabet to the shop in stages. 
what letters will your kids want? 
maybe you'll want to spell her name? 
convo me for custom name listings & other offerings. 
stay tuned... flash cards, matching memory game cards, postcards, stickers, magnets & plush are all coming soon!
-----

This listing is for an archival, giclee print. The paper measures 12 x 16" with a clean white border, which can be trimmed or covered with a mat of your choice. 

Please note that actual colors may slightly vary from those shown due to the nature of photographic/printing processes and as well as individual computer monitor settings. 


=====================About Your Print=======================

Printed on Velvet Fine Art Paper paper (matte) with archival inks tested to last 100+ years. This print is bright and of stunning quality!

Please note, the watermark won't appear on your print.

Each print is hand signed and numbered on the front. 

The original illustration was completed in pen & digitally colored, and printed by me, in Baltimore, MD. 

Please be aware that sales of artwork do not include any transfer of copyright or reproduction rights. Thank you!
===================== Shipping =======================

All prints are shipped in a cellophane sleeve packaged in sturdy padded envelope with a cardboard sheet to ensure its safety while in transit. Envelopes will be marked "do not bend" & will ship First Class Mail, unless otherwise stated in your "message to seller" at checkout. If you are requesting an upgrade in shipping, please wait for an adjusted invoice before paying.

name: Coloring Book of Under Appreciated Animals: rare animal ABCs
description:
A is for Alligator
B is for Bear
C is for Cat

... there's nothing *wrong* with that, of course, but your kid's cooler than that, right? 
Why not spruce up her toy collection and give her something to get REALLY excited about with the Under-appreciated Animal series by *mightyPigeon!?

this project began when I started realizing that my son's favorite animals at the zoo were also the ones you never see in books or cards or toys for kids... he loved the Dik-Dik, for example, but I couldn't find him any books or cards that didn't use a Dog, a Duck or a Deer. 

raise a cooler kid & learn about some new animals at the same time!
-----------

This listing is for a 13 page (double sided) coloring book. Each page features a different animal , letter & animal name. Based on the original illustrations from the Under Appreciated Animals series, the lines has been tweaked to make them bolder & appealing to little hands & minds. 

An excellent travel companion-- tuck one away in the car console or diaper bag; great for road trips or an after school break; packed with pages to keep kids busy. Bring one to your local zoo & see which animals YOU can find! 

younger kids will love learning their letters and enjoy the cute animals and bright colors. 

older kids will love learning about & testing their knowledge of unique animals.

name: Fun Fact Flash Card set of 26 cards featuring the Under Appreciated Animals series
description:
A is for Alligator
B is for Bear
C is for Cat

... there's nothing *wrong* with that, of course, but your kid's cooler than that, right? 
Why not spruce up her toy collection and give her something to get REALLY excited about with the Under-appreciated Animal series by *mightyPigeon!?

this project began when I started realizing that my son's favorite animals at the zoo were also the ones you never see in books or cards or toys for kids... he loved the Dik-Dik, for example, but I couldn't find him any books or cards that didn't use a Dog, a Duck or a Deer. 

raise a cooler kid & learn about some new animals at the same time!
-----------


this listing is for a set of 26 double sided flash cards. the fronts of the cards feature the animal & letter illustrations from the series/ the back sides give you their name & showcase a cool a list of fun facts about each animal (did you know a group of Tapirs is called a "candle"?!). there's one card per animal (one animal per letter). the backs also include the pronunciation for the animals name... some of them are tricky!

the cards are professionally printed on sturdy weight plastic coated paper-- like decks of cards you'd buy in the store. the fronts are glossy & the backsides are matte (to make reading easier). they measure 4" x 6" * have rounded edges to help little hands grip them (and avoid pointy-pokey corners!). 

this set comes in a cotton muslin drawstring bag, for ease of storage. makes a great travel companion-- slides easily into back packs & diaper bags; fits nicely in car consoles for emergency entertainment!

younger kids will love learning their letters and enjoy the cute animals and bright colors. 

older kids will love learning about & testing their knowledge of unique animals. 

the under appreciated animals are: 
axolotl
bandicoot
capybara
dik-dik
elephant shrew
fennec fox
gannet
hyrax
indri
jerboa
kinkajou
loris
manatee
narwhal
okapi
pangolin
quokka
red panda
sifaka
tapir
upupa
viscacha
weedy sea dragon
xoloitzcuintli
yaminon
zorrilla

name: Under Appreciated Animals Memory Matching Card Game
description:
A is for Alligator
B is for Bear
C is for Cat

... there's nothing *wrong* with that, of course, but your kid's cooler than that, right? 
Why not spruce up her room and give her something to get REALLY excited about with the Under-appreciated Animal series by *mightyPigeon!?

this project began when I started realizing that my son's favorite animals at the zoo were also the ones you never see in books or cards or toys for kids... he loved the Dik-Dik, for example, but I couldn't find him any books or cards that didn't use a Dog, a Duck or a Deer. 

raise a cooler kid & learn about some new animals at the same time!
-----------


this listing is for a deck of 54 playing cards (1 joker, 1 instruction card & 26 pairs of matching animals/letters in capital & lowercase). cards are professionally printed on sturdy weight plastic coated paper-- like decks of cards you'd buy in the store. they measure 2.5 x 3.5". 

each deck comes cello wrapped & packaged in a white paper box (shown above). 

you can use the cards to play a memory matching game (where you flip over cards two at a time, looking for matching pairs) OR like Go Fish or Old Maid, by dealing out hands of 7 cards & putting the rest in a pile to "fish" from. You can use the joker card (which looks like the poster shown in the last image) as the "old maid". 

younger kids will love learning their capital & lowercase letters and enjoy the cute animals and bright colors. 

older kids will love the range of games they can play with a single deck of cards & enjoy testing their knowledge of unique animals.
